channel.title: Error Connecting
channel.description:
Every single server I try and connect to I get Error Connecting.
I have tried using v3.2 and 4.0 of the webclient, I've also downloaded the client and still the same problem.
When I use the downloadable client it says this in the console "Couldn't open output stream to log file Crip or Blud-20120323.log"
And when I use the webclient I get "Couldn't create directory logs"
If anyone could help me that'd be great. Thanks

item.title: Error Connecting
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

maybe take out the function that makes the .log files, and see if that changes anything…
Tbh, i have never seen a file that makes .log files for each player…

Off topic…Awesome name

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting
item.dc:creator: @Crip_or_Blood Crip or Blood
item.description:
@Crip_or_Blood wrote:

Every single server I try and connect to I get Error Connecting.

I have tried using v3.2 and 4.0 of the webclient, I’ve also downloaded the client and still the same problem.

When I use the downloadable client it says this in the console
“Couldn’t open output stream to log file Crip or Blud-20120323.log”

And when I use the webclient I get
“Couldn’t create directory logs”

If anyone could help me that’d be great. Thanks
